description: Removed fake AggregateRating (4.9/50000) from SoftwareApplication schema — no real review data exists
Replaced SoftwareApplication with FinancialProduct schema; removed fake AggregateRating and Review; removed twitter:creator duplicate
GEOKeyTakeaways component rendered on ALL asset pages (not just seed set)
EEAT byline and Last Updated date now shown on ALL pages (was seed-only)
OG image now uses reliable site-wide fallback instead of per-asset dynamic path
Breadcrumb schema now uses Markets as parent (was Trade)
Standardized disclaimer uses exact mandated text
Last Updated date set to February 7 2026 (current date)
New component: 3-bullet Key Takeaways for AI Overviews — definition / influencers / simulator value
Removed itemScope/itemType/itemProp microdata attributes to prevent conflicting schema signals
Changed getAssetSlug to use asset.id instead of symbol-based slug — fixes broken internal links for forex pairs
Changed TabsTrigger value from 'stocks' to 'stock' — fixes stocks not appearing when filtered
Changed TabsTrigger value from 'commodities' to 'commodity' — fixes commodities not appearing when filtered
Meta titles rewritten with benefit-first CTR modifiers (Practice X Free — $10K Simulator | Live Data 2026)
Meta descriptions rewritten without emoji for cleaner SERP display; all ≤155 chars
Variant B meta titles exported as META_TITLE_VARIANTS_B for A/B testing after 7-day window
Variant B meta descriptions exported as META_DESC_VARIANTS_B for A/B testing
Seed asset pages touched — deliverable artifact
Machine-readable summaries per seed asset — deliverable artifact
Updated schema validation results after cleanup
Slug consistency report — all match
OG image validation — all using site-wide fallback
